Vector2D  translation,
boolean  intersected,

Creates a Collision Event To Hold The Collision's Data Needed By The Handler

Parameters:
source The Source Object of The Collision
other The Other Object of The Collision
translation The Correction Vector For The Source Object
intersected a Boolean Which Indicates if There Are Any Collision
willIntersect a Boolean Which Indicated if a Collision Will Happen Later Or Not
